ModMetaData.name: Higgs Monaghan Armor Set
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds Higgs Monaghan Armor Set from Death Stranding
[h1]Features:[/h1] - Higgs Hooded skull mask - Higgs Apparel - Higgs Rifle
Commissioned for "Higgs_The_God_Particle#9851" from "Rimworld Mod Market" Discord.
[h1]Credits:[/h1] -Death Stranding -JangoDsoul- Art and XML coder
